name: Whole (alegottu)
description:
Creature Artwork: Roey Shapiro
Music: Nelson Mencos

Universal Controls:
W A S D or Arrow Keys to move
Space to jump
Esc to pause

As the guardian angel (white):
Left Mouse to place lights (up to 3 per checkpoint)
Right Mouse to place emotional fragment (1 per stage, excluding the tutorial)

As the friend (black):
Shift to dash
Ctrl to wall grab
Left Mouse to parry

Some of these controls can be changed in the options menu, accessed through pausing. You gain abilities over time by picking up emotional fragments on each stage; initially you can only move and jump as the friend.
